bibl.title: Coptic and Arabic Papyri from Deir al-Balā'izah.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Study of the Arabic texts found in the monastery of Deir al-Balā'izah. The papyri deal with official, internal Arab administration matters and it is suggested that the monastery had purchased them on the second hand papyrus market. - Introduction. - Description of Arabic texts. - Trade in second hand papyrus. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Petra M., Coptic and Arabic Papyri from Deir al-Balā'izah.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 707-713.

Study of the Arabic texts found in the monastery of Deir al-Balā'izah. The papyri deal with official, internal Arab administration matters and it is suggested that the monastery had purchased them on the second hand papyrus market. - Introduction. - Description of Arabic texts. - Trade in second hand papyrus. - Conclusion.
